DataCategory.name: Finance
DataCategory.description: Financial data, such as credit/debit card data, other payment information, credit scores, etc.

DataCategory.name: Health
DataCategory.description: Health Information, such as information about health conditions, prescriptions, medication, as well as health monitoring data, e.g., heart rate, step count, activity level, etc.

DataCategory.name: Demographic
DataCategory.description: Demographic Information, e.g., gender, age, occupation, education, etc.

DataCategory.name: Location
DataCategory.description: Geo-location information (e.g., user's current location) regardless of granularity, i.e., could be exact location, ZIP code, city-level.
items: GSM, UMTS, and GPS location data

DataCategory.name: Personal identity identifier
DataCategory.description: Identifiers that uniquely identify a person,e.g., SSN, driver's license number, etc.

DataCategory.name: Online identifier
DataCategory.description: Permanent (e.g., device IDs, MAC address) or temporary (e.g., IP address) identifiers needed to establish a connection for the current browsing session. Identifiers locally stored on user's device by the company/organization or third-parties including cookies, beacons, or similar that are commonly used to uniquely identify users, but that are not essential to establish a connection with the userâ€™s device or to provide a service.
items: Log in data to online services

DataCategory.name: Device information
DataCategory.description: Technical information about devices (including PC, mobile phones, etc.) used

DataCategory.name: Biometric information
DataCategory.description: Unique, measurable biological characteristics and traits of a person that can be used for identification and authentication purposes

DataCategory.name: User online activities
DataCategory.description: The user's online activities on the website/app or other websites/apps, e.g., pages visited, time spent on pages, general user behavior online, etc.

DataCategory.name: User profile
DataCategory.description: The user's profile on the website/app and its contents, e.g., data in user profile, data that user uploaded to website, user comments, user profile preferences, etc. This is common for websites/apps where users can create an account or profile, e.g., on twitter, youtube, Facebook, Amazon, etc.

DataCategory.name: Social media data
DataCategory.description: User profile and data from a social media website/app or other third party service to which the user gave the first party access, e.g., by connecting with Facebook, twitter, or other services. Exchanged data may include user profile, photos, comments, friends, etc.
items: Contacts (Followers, Followees, Friends, Their gender etc)

DataCategory.name: Criminal records/Court judgements
DataCategory.description: Criminal records detail an individual's interactions with the criminal justice system, encompassing arrests, charges, indictments, convictions, and sentences, while court judgments represent formal legal decisions by courts, specifying findings, rulings, and outcomes of legal proceedings.
items: Closed court sittings in civil matters
Criminal records of convictions and offences

DataCategory.name: Generic personal information
DataCategory.description: No specific type of information is mentioned, but the policy talks about 'your information', 'your data', 'personal information', 'personal data' or 'personal identifiable information' in general.

DataCategory.name: Survey data
DataCategory.description: Any data that is collected through surveys.

DataCategory.name: Other
DataCategory.description: A specific type of information not covered by the above categories.

DataCategory.name: Unspecified
DataCategory.description: The type of information is not explicitly stated or unclear (e.g., refers to 'information' very generically).
